great neigborhood restaurant - everyone eating there knew the owners and the owners knew them.  Food was great tasting and large portions.  Best of all the bill was extremely reasonable, even with some drinks.  It's a real happening place.Almost forgot to mention this.  We showed up without a reservation and the place was packed.  we went into the restaurant to get on a waiting list, but there isn't any.  One of the locals instructed us onthe custom for getting a seat at the counter - when folks have finished eating and have paid their bill, hover and swoop in to get a seat.  It was great sitting at the counter and we struck up conversation with the locals, who were very welcoming.  Service was quick and they paid attention if you wanted another glass of wine or needed anything else.
